exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));

    'æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°',
    'è¿è½½æ¼«ç”»',
    'å®Œç»“æ¼«ç”»'
];
type = [
    '/update/d30.html',
    '/list/lianzai/index_p{{page}}.html',
    '/list/wanjie/index_p{{page}}.html'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${type[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = [
    'æ—¥æ’è¡Œ',
    'å‘¨æ’è¡Œ',
    'æœˆæ’è¡Œ',
    'æ€»æ’è¡Œ'
];
rank = [
    '/rank/',
    '/rank/week.html',
    '/rank/month.html',
    '/rank/total.html'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${rank[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/list/';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.genre') ? J.select('.genre').select('li') : [];
O1 = `\${get('o1',Get('o'))}`;
P1 = `\${get('p1',Get('p'))}`;
Q1 = `\${get('q1',Get('q'))}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
S1 = `\${get('s1',Get('s'))}`;
T1 = `\${get('t1',Get('s'))}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\/|\/$/g, '');
    var Filter = `{{String(\`${P1}_${kind}_${O1}_${T1}_${S1}_${Q1}/\`).replace(/_+/g,'_').replace(/_\\//g,'\/').replace(/^_|^\\//g,'')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${Filter}${R1}_p{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes('/d30')) {
        var list =  java.getElements('.latest-list li');
        for (i in list) {
            name = list[i].select('.ell').text();
            kind = /"sl"/.test(list[i]) ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“';
            latest = String(list[i].select('.tt').text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°è‡³|^å…±/, '') + String('ã€”' + String(list[i].select('.dt').text()) + 'ã€•').replace(/ã€”ã€•/, '');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': String(list[i].select('.ell a').attr('href')).replace(/\/comic/, 'https:////cf.mhgui.com/cpic/b').replace(/\/$/, '.jpg'),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.ell a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  java.getElements('tbody tr');
        for (i in list) {
            name = list[i].select('h5').text();
            author = list[i].select('.rank-author').text();
            kind = list[i].select('.rank-score').text() + ',' + list[i].select('.cRed').text() + ',NO:' + list[i].select('.rank-no').text() + ',' + (/"trend-up"/.test(list[i]) ? 'ğŸ”º' : 'ğŸ”»');
            latest = String(list[i].select('.rank-update').text()) + String('ã€”' + String(list[i].select('.rank-time').text()) + 'ã€•').replace(/ã€”ã€•/, '');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': String(list[i].select('h5 a').attr('href')).replace(/\/comic/, 'https:////cf.mhgui.com/cpic/b').replace(/\/$/, '.jpg'),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('h5 a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/list/')) {
        var list =  java.getElements('#contList li');
        for (i in list) {
            name = list[i].select('.ell').text();
            kind = list[i].select('.updateon em').text() + ',' + (/"sl"/.test(list[i]) ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“');
            latest = String(list[i].select('.tt').text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°è‡³|^å…±/, '') + String('ã€”' + String(list[i].select('.updateon').text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°äºï¼š/, '').replace(/(\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}).*/, '$1') + 'ã€•').replace(/ã€”ã€•/, '');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': String(list[i].select('.ell a').attr('href')).replace(/\/comic/, 'https:////cf.mhgui.com/cpic/b').replace(/\/$/, '.jpg'),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.ell a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/_p(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '_p' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || next_1.select('#contList li')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {

            title0 = title;

            title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/s/' + e + get('so',Get('r')) + '_p{{page}}.html';
}(key));
